dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hail in the capital this afternoon, can you believe that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hail in the capital this afternoon, can you believe that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 11: The capital will experience variable cloudiness, with brief rain, thunderstorms, and possible hail in the afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the gusts are supposed to reach, um, 15 to 18 meters per second. That's pretty strong wind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the gusts are supposed to reach, um, fifteen to eighteen meters per second. That's pretty strong wind.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Winds will be from the east-southeast at 9-14 m/s, with gusts reaching 15-18 m/s in the daytime.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild—thunderstorms and possible hail on June 11th, which is today. I hope people brought an umbrella like the forecast suggested.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild-thunderstorms and possible hail on June eleventh, which is today. I hope people brought an umbrella like the forecast suggested.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 11: The capital will experience variable cloudiness, with brief rain, thunderstorms, and possible hail in the afternoon. Be sure to take an umbrella with you.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just a one-day thing either. The instability is sticking around through the 13th, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just a one-day thing either. The instability is sticking around through the thirteenth, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable weather is expected in Astana and Almaty over the next few days, with rain, thunderstorms, and even hail in the capital. Here's the latest weather forecast for June 11-13.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Variable cloudiness, short rain, thunderstorms… it's like the weather just can't make up its mind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Variable cloudiness, short rain, thunderstorms... it's like the weather just can't make up its mind.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 12: The weather will remain unstable with variable cloudiness, short rain, and thunderstorms. June 13: Variable cloudiness will persist, with occasional rain and thunderstorms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: At least the temperatures are staying warm though. Daytime highs around 29 to 31 today? That's still pretty hot for stormy weather.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At least the temperatures are staying warm though. Daytime highs around twenty nine to thirty one today? That's still pretty hot for stormy weather.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Night temperatures will be +14ÂC to +16ÂC, while daytime highs will reach +29ÂC to +31ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, but then by Friday it dips a bit to like 25 to 27 degrees. Still pleasant, but you'll need that raincoat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but then by Friday it dips a bit to like twenty five to twenty seven degrees. Still pleasant, but you'll need that raincoat.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Night temperatures will range from +16ÂC to +18ÂC, and daytime highs will be between +25ÂC and +27ÂC. Friday will see continued rainy weather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Almaty's getting it too—light rain and thunderstorms, but their winds are calmer, only 3 to 8 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Almaty's getting it too-light rain and thunderstorms, but their winds are calmer, only three to eight meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 11: Almaty will experience variable cloudiness with light rain and thunderstorms. Winds will be from the east at 3-8 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Almaty's highs are even hitting 30 to 32, so it's gonna feel humid with all that rain around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Almaty's highs are even hitting thirty to thirty two, so it's gonna feel humid with all that rain around.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Night temperatures will range from +18ÂC to +20ÂC, and daytime highs will be between +30ÂC and +32ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Kazhydromet did warn us about this earlier—June is just unstable overall, with these alternating cool and hot periods.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazhydromet did warn us about this earlier-June is just unstable overall, with these alternating cool and hot periods.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Kazhydromet's earlier forecasts, June will bring unstable weather with alternating cool and hot periods, accompanied by rain, some of which could be heavy, along with thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And don't forget they mentioned dust storms possible on some days too. Just adds to the chaos.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And don't forget they mentioned dust storms possible on some days too. Just adds to the chaos.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dust storms are also possible on certain days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, packing an umbrella and maybe a jacket seems like the move for the next few days. You just never know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Honestly, packing an umbrella and maybe a jacket seems like the move for the next few days. You just never know.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Stay dry out there, folks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Stay dry out there, folks.
